trans-unit.source: Enables nested components such as content pages and user controls to add script and service references to pages when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control is already defined in a parent element.
trans-unit.target: 使嵌套的组件，如内容页和用户控件脚本和服务将引用添加到页时<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>控件已在父元素中定义。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction A Web page can contain only one control, either directly on the page or indirectly inside a nested or parent component.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#introduction) - [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax) # # 介绍 A Web 页只能包含一个控制，请直接在页上或在嵌套间接或父组件。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptManagerProxy control lets you add scripts and services to content pages and to user controls if the master page or host page already contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: ScriptManagerProxy 控件，你将添加脚本和服务到内容页和用户控件如果母版页或主机页已包含<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: When you use the ScriptManagerProxy control, you can add to the script and service collections defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 ScriptManagerProxy 控件时，你可以将添加到所定义的脚本和服务集合<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to include specific scripts and services on every page that includes a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control, you can remove them from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不想要包括特定于脚本以及包括特定每一页上的服务<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件，你可以将其删除从<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: You can then add them to individual pages by using the ScriptManagerProxy control instead.
trans-unit.target: 你可以然后将其添加到各个页通过改为使用 ScriptManagerProxy 控件。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                          ```
trans-unit.target: # # 声明性语法```                                                                                          ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A page that contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control must also contain a valid <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含的页<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控件还必须包含一个有效<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are putting a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control on a content page, the page must reference a master page that contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你将<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>内容页中，页上的控件必须引用包含母版页<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager"></xref>对象与当前的<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager> object that is returned by this property represents the authentication service that is registered with the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager>此属性返回的对象表示向该页面注册的身份验证服务。</xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager>

trans-unit.source: You can use the ASP.NET authentication service or use a custom authentication service.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 ASP.NET 身份验证服务，或使用自定义身份验证服务。

trans-unit.source: To use a custom service, you can register it by including a `AuthenticationService` element inside the `ScriptManagerProxy` element on the page.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用自定义服务，可以注册包括由它`AuthenticationService`内的元素`ScriptManagerProxy`页面上的元素。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically configure the <xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式配置<xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager"></xref> object for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager"> </xref>当前对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the composite script that supports the content page.
trans-unit.target: 获取对支持内容页的复合脚本的引用。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the composite script.
trans-unit.target: 对复合脚本的引用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the browser's **Back** or **Forward** button.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击浏览器的时发生**回**或**转发**按钮。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the browser's **Back** button, the browser navigates through previously-viewed URLs, which can include URLs that contain history-point state data.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击浏览器的**回**按钮，浏览器将转到以前查看过的 Url，其中包括包含历史时间点状态数据的 Url。

trans-unit.source: If client code in the Web page detects that the URL contains history state data, it makes a request to the server page.
trans-unit.target: 如果网页中的客户端代码检测到该 URL 包含历史记录状态数据，它将发出一个请求到服务器页。

trans-unit.source: This acts as a postback event, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> server control raises the `Navigate` event.
trans-unit.target: 回发事件，将充当和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>服务器控件引发`Navigate`事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event and re-create the page as required in the Web application by using the state data that is passed with the event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理此事件，并重新创建与事件使用传递的状态数据的根据需要在 Web 应用程序中的页。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Raises the base <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event and registers the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> control with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 对基<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref>事件和寄存器<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>控件替换为<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager"></xref>对象与当前的<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager> object that is returned by this property represents the profile service that is registered with the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager>此属性返回的对象表示向该页面注册配置文件服务。</xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager>

trans-unit.source: You can use the ASP.NET profile service or use a custom profile service.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 ASP.NET 配置文件服务，或使用自定义配置文件服务。

trans-unit.source: To use a custom service, you can register it by including a `ProfileService` element inside the `ScriptManagerProxy` element on the page.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用自定义服务，可以注册包括由它`ProfileService`内的元素`ScriptManagerProxy`页面上的元素。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically configure the <xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式配置<xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager"></xref> object for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager"> </xref>当前对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager"></xref>对象与当前的<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager> object that is returned by this property represents the role service that is registered with the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager>此属性返回的对象表示向该页面注册角色服务。</xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager>

trans-unit.source: You can use the ASP.NET role service or use a custom role service.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 ASP.NET 角色服务或使用自定义的角色服务。

trans-unit.source: To use a custom service, you can register it by including a `RoleService` element inside the `ScriptManagerProxy` element on the page.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用自定义服务，可以注册包括由它`RoleService`内的元素`ScriptManagerProxy`页面上的元素。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically configure the <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式配置<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager"></xref> object for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager"> </xref>当前对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceCollection"></xref> object that contains a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> object for each script file that is explicitly registered with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceCollection"></xref>对象，其中包含<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref>显式注册每个脚本文件的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The Scripts collection enables you to add script references to any scripts that are already registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 脚本集合让你可以添加到任何已注册的脚本的脚本引用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: You can add script references to the Scripts collection declaratively by using the `ScriptReference` element.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用以声明方式添加到脚本集合的脚本引用`ScriptReference`元素。

trans-unit.source: You can add script references programmatically by adding <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> objects to the Scripts collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过添加以编程方式添加脚本引用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>的脚本集合的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>

trans-unit.source: If a script is already registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> or <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control, the script is not registered again.
trans-unit.target: 如果脚本已注册到<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>或<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件，该脚本将不会再注册。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> objects for each script file that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> control sends to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref>对于每个脚本的对象文件<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>控件将发送到浏览器。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceCollection"></xref> object that contains a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> object for each service that is explicitly registered with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceCollection"></xref>对象，其中包含<xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref>显式注册每个服务对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The Services collection enables you to add services to any services that are already registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 服务集合让你可以将服务添加到已注册到任何服务<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: You can add service references to the Services collection declaratively by using the `ServiceReference` element.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用以声明方式添加到服务集合的服务引用`ServiceReference`元素。

trans-unit.source: You can add service references programmatically by adding <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference> objects to the Services collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过添加以编程方式添加服务引用<xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>服务集合的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>

trans-unit.source: If a service is already registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> or <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control, the service is not registered again.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务已注册到<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>或<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件，该服务不会再注册。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> object for each service that is registered with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref>注册的每个服务对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible*> property inherited from the base <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> class to prevent setting this value.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible*>属性继承自基类<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref>类以防止设置此值。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is overridden in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> class to prevent setting this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>属性被重写，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>类以防止设置此属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Visible property returns `true` unless it is inside a container, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> whose <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Visible 属性返回`true`除非它是在容器内，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is rendered on the page; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件是否呈现在页;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A value is assigned to the Visible property.
trans-unit.target: Visible 属性则赋值。
